i have tried to switch the symmetry mode but i can't figure it out?

I saw some videos on youtube where they have the symmetry mode on where there is a cube??

The only thing i have is the dotted mode?

Am i completely wrong here?

The SPH and the VAB have different symmetry. Also, you can click on the symmetry indicator in the top right or press X to cycle through the symmetry options, if you didn't know.

Edit: Also, C toggles the angle snap mode.

Yes but if you look at this video:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6qL16W1ahts&feature=plcp

At 0:50 he's building a airplane but the symmetry mode he uses is different?
That's the standard SPH "mirror" symmetry. As @trbinsc wrote - SPH and VAB have different symmetry modes.
In the vid (which is unavailable) Im guessing he is using the editor extensions mod, where you can switch symmetry modes
FYI, if you would like to do some non-mirror and mirror mixing in 1 craft. You may just copy your craft file from "Rocket Hanger(VAB)" to "Air Plane Hanger(SPH)" or vice-verse.
